scripts.build: npm run build:packages && npm run build:apps
scripts.build:packages: npm -w @aether/shared-utils run build && npm -w @aether/shared-types run build
scripts.build:apps: npm -w @aether/gateway run build && npm -w @aether/rag-service run build && npm -w @aether/content-service run build && npm -w @aether/observability-service run build
scripts.typecheck: npm run typecheck:packages && npm run typecheck:apps
scripts.typecheck:packages: npm -w @aether/shared-utils run typecheck && npm -w @aether/shared-types run typecheck
scripts.typecheck:apps: npm -w @aether/gateway run typecheck && npm -w @aether/rag-service run typecheck && npm -w @aether/content-service run typecheck && npm -w @aether/observability-service run typecheck
